stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"具体物"; 2. 表名词,"行为或结果等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: allure吸引+ment具体物→n.诱惑物
embank筑堤+ment具体物→n.堤防,筑堤
equip装备+ment具体物→n.设备,器材,装置;才能
gar装饰3+ment表名词→装饰的东西,衣服
nourish提供养分+ment具体物→n.食物,营养品
oint=oil油+ment具体物→n.油膏,软膏
pave铺路+ment具体物→n.人行道
seg切,割+ment具体物→n.段,片,节,部分
achieve完成,达到+ment行为或结果等→n.成就,功绩
argu+ment行为或结果等→n.争论,辩论,论据
command命令+ment行为或结果等→n.戒律

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意见不同,不调和,争执,不和,争论
stems_affixes.word_buile: disagree有分歧;不一致+ment行为或结果等→n.意见不同,不调和,争执,不和,争论
embezzle盗用+ment行为或结果等→n.贪污,侵吞
embody体现+ment行为或结果等→embodiment
enact实施,颁布+ment行为或结果等→n.设定,制定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 建立,设立,建立的机构[或组织]
stems_affixes.word_buile: establish建立+ment行为或结果等→n.建立,设立,建立的机构[或组织]
fulfill完成+ment行为或结果等→n.完成,履行
govern统治,支配+ment行为或结果等→n.政府
harass烦恼+ment行为或结果等→n.骚扰,扰乱;烦恼,烦乱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 经营,管理;处理,操纵;管理部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: manage管理+ment行为或结果等→n.经营,管理;处理,操纵;管理部门
measure测量+ment行为或结果等→n.测量法,度量
move移动+ment行为或结果等→n.运动,活动;移动,迁移
pay支付+ment行为或结果等→n.付款,支付,报酬
pre预先+dica命令+ment行为或结果等→预先命令做→进入困境
refine精炼,精制+ment行为或结果等→n.精致,文雅,精巧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 点心,饮料,精力恢复,爽快
stems_affixes.word_buile: refresh使清新+ment行为或结果等→精力恢复,爽快→点心,饮料
commence开始+ment行为或结果等→开始→毕业典礼[开始新的旅程]

sentences.en: Foreign governments have been consulted about this decision.

means.word_mean: （一国的）统治，治理，统治方式，管理方法

sentences.en: Government of a large city is very difficult.
sentences.cn: 管理一个大城市是非常困难的。</seg>

entry.def: The government of a country is the group of people who are responsible for governing it.

example.ex: The Government has insisted that confidence is needed before the economy can improve.
example.tran: 政府坚持认为只有坚定信心经济才会有起色。

example.ex: ...democratic governments in countries like Britain and the US.
example.tran: 诸如英美等国的民主政府

entry.def: Government consists of the activities, methods, and principles involved in governing a country or other political unit.

example.ex: The first four years of government were completely disastrous.
example.tran: 政府前4年的执政彻底失败。

means.word_mean: 1. the organization that is the governing authority of a political unit;

sentences.sentence: "the matter was referred to higher authorities"

means.word_mean: 2. (government) the system or form by which a community or other political unit is governed;
3. the act of governing; exercising authority;

sentences.sentence: "regulations for the governing of state prisons"

means.word_mean: 4. the study of government of states and other political units

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French governement, from governer (see govern)

sentences.cn: 美国不会谋求把任何政体强加给任何国家.
sentences.en: Now , America will not seek to impose any system of government on any other nation.

sentences.en: The earliest civilized governments were thus priestly governments.

sentences.en: Under the control of modem constitutionalism, limited government is the only legal governmental mode.

sentences.en: The two systems of government are polar opposites.
